item.description:
Okay Trekkies, get your thinking caps on, because there's going to be a Star Trek Trivia night. (There will also be the chance to play other games afterward, so please bring your favorites to play.) Tara and Judy have been nice enough to host a game night in Tara's home in Ipswich, and it should be a really good time.

Feel free to bring anything you would like to drink; pizza will be ordered sometime during the evening. Just a note, this is a household with one dog and three cats who are inside/outside pets.

Should you have any extra folding chairs, please bring them with you. Thanks.

An alternate number for the evening is Judy's: 978-380-0612. Any question that you would have about the evening, please message either Tara or Judy.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Star Trek Trivia Night
